long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The CAP Center Shopping Button is a Chrome browser extension that notifies users when they visit an online merchant who will donate a portion of every purchase to The Child Abuse Prevention Center. 

The user may also visit The CAP Center Shopping & Donation Mall at http://thecapcenter.shoppinganddonation.com/ to find additional online stores that participate in this CAP Center donation program.
